questions.question: When was Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe born?
questions.answer: Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe was born on 16 March 1959.

questions.question: What position did Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe hold from 12 May 2022 to 29 July 2024?
questions.answer: Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe served as the Minister of Justice, Prison Affairs, and Constitutional Reforms.

questions.question: Which president appointed Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe as Minister of Justice in 2022?
questions.answer: Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe was appointed Minister of Justice by President Gotabaya Rajapaksa.

questions.question: Who succeeded Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe as Minister of Justice in 2024?
questions.answer: Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe was succeeded by Ali Sabry as Minister of Justice.

questions.question: In which year did Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe first become a Member of Parliament?
questions.answer: Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe became a Member of Parliament in 2004.

questions.question: Which political party did Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe join in 2004?
questions.answer: Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe joined the Sri Lanka Freedom Party (SLFP) in 2004.

questions.question: What role did Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe play in the 2018 Sri Lankan constitutional crisis?
questions.answer: During the 2018 Sri Lankan constitutional crisis, Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe served as the Minister of Education and Higher Education.

questions.question: Which ministerial position did Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe hold from 1 May 2018 to 26 October 2018?
questions.answer: Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe was the Minister of Higher Education and Cultural Affairs.

questions.question: When did Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe serve as Minister of Education?
questions.answer: Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe served as Minister of Education from 29 October 2018 to 15 December 2018.

questions.question: What controversy surrounded Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe in 2018 regarding his ministerial position?
questions.answer: In 2018, Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe's ministerial post was suspended by the court due to the constitutional crisis.

questions.question: Which position did Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe hold from 4 September 2015 to 23 August 2017?
questions.answer: Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe was the Minister of Buddha Sasana.

questions.question: Who was the president during Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe's tenure as Minister of Buddha Sasana?
questions.answer: During Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe's tenure as Minister of Buddha Sasana, the president was Maithripala Sirisena.

questions.question: Which political party did Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe represent from 2010 to 2019?
questions.answer: Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe represented the United National Party (UNP) from 2010 to 2019.

questions.question: In which position did Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe serve from 23 November 2005 to 23 April 2010?
questions.answer: Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe served as the Non-Cabinet Minister for State Banks Development.

questions.question: Which position did Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe hold from 2015 to 2017?
questions.answer: Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe served as Minister of Justice from 2015 to 2017.

questions.question: What was the controversy related to Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe's role in the MV X-Press Pearl incident?
questions.answer: Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe was involved in controversy over the compensation amount and claims of bribery related to the MV X-Press Pearl incident.

questions.question: Which office did Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe assume on 12 May 2024?
questions.answer: Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe was appointed the Chairman of the Sri Lanka Freedom Party on 12 May 2024.

questions.question: What legal action was taken against Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe on 20 May 2024?
questions.answer: On 20 May 2024, the Colombo District Court issued an interim order preventing Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe from functioning as the party chairman.

questions.question: Which prestigious award did Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe receive in 2007?
questions.answer: Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe was named 'Sri Lankan of the Year 2007' by LMD magazine.

questions.question: What was Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe's role in the Bar Association of Sri Lanka in 2012?
questions.answer: In 2012, Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe was elected President of the Bar Association of Sri Lanka.

questions.question: Which controversial political figure did Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe support during his time with the Bar Association?
questions.answer: Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe supported former Chief Justice Shirani Bandaranayake during her impeachment.

questions.question: When was Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe's tenure as Minister of Higher Education and Cultural Affairs?
questions.answer: Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe served as Minister of Higher Education and Cultural Affairs from 1 May 2018 to 26 October 2018.

questions.question: What significant role did Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe hold in the Sri Lanka Freedom Party (SLFP) in 2024?
questions.answer: In 2024, Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe was controversially appointed as Chairman of the Sri Lanka Freedom Party.

questions.question: Which position did Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe hold in the Sri Lankan Parliament from 2004 to 2010?
questions.answer: Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe was a Member of Parliament for the National List from 2004 to 2010.

questions.question: What was Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe's role in the Committee On Public Enterprises in 2006?
questions.answer: Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe was elected Chairman of the Committee On Public Enterprises in 2006.

questions.question: What position did Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe hold from 29 October 2018 to 15 December 2018?
questions.answer: Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe served as the Minister of Education.

questions.question: Which president was in office during Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe's term as Minister of State Banks Development?
questions.answer: President Mahinda Rajapaksa was in office during Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe's term as Minister of State Banks Development.

questions.question: Who were the Prime Ministers during Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe's term as Minister of Justice from 2022 to 2024?
questions.answer: The Prime Ministers were Ranil Wickremesinghe and Dinesh Gunawardena.

questions.question: What role did Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe have in the 2005 presidential elections?
questions.answer: Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe was appointed Minister of State Banking Development after the 2005 presidential elections.

questions.question: When did Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe resign from his position as Minister of State Banks Development?
questions.answer: Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe resigned from his position as Minister of State Banks Development in April 2006.

questions.question: Which party did Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe support during his tenure with the Bar Association of Sri Lanka?
questions.answer: Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe supported the opposition party during his tenure with the Bar Association of Sri Lanka.

questions.question: Who was the Prime Minister of Sri Lanka when Wijeyadasa Rajapakshe was appointed as Minister of Justice in 2015?
questions.answer: The Prime Minister was Ranil Wickremesinghe.
